alert.note: Alert for Davidson; Rutherford; Williamson; Wilson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 01 at 1:15AM CDT until April 01 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Davidson County in Middle Tennessee... Rutherford County in Middle Tennessee... Eastern Williamson County in Middle Tennessee... Central Wilson County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 200 AM CDT. * At 115 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Hermitage to Franklin, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Murfreesboro, Franklin, Lebanon, Smyrna, Brentwood, La Vergne, Mount Juliet, Nolensville, Watertown, Hermitage, Walterhill, Rural Hill, Antioch, Belinda City, Lascassas, Tuckers Crossroads, Triune, Cedars Of Lebanon State Park, Percy Priest Lake and Milton. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between mile markers 214 and 246. Interstate 24 between mile markers 53 and 82. Interstate 840 between mile markers 32 and 76. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 AM CDT for Middle Tennessee. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
